parameters.name: Params
parameters.description: Array of the names of the parameters

parameters.name: Values
parameters.description: Array of the values for the parameters

title: IConfiguration.SetParameters
description: Sets the parameters (suppression state of features, suppression state or visibility of components, dimensions, and so on) for this configuration.
signature:
void SetParameters( 
   ref System.Object
Params
,
   ref System.Object
Values
)

parameters.name: Params
parameters.description: Array of the names of the parameters

parameters.name: Values
parameters.description: Array of the values for the parameters

remarks:
You can control these parameters in a part document:
Dimension values. Specify the dimension name in Params for example, D1@Sketch1) and the value in Values (for example, 60.0mm).
Suppression state of features. Specify the feature name in Params (for example, $STATE@Extrude2) and the suppression state in Values (S=Suppressed or R=Resolved).
